actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Emergency Petroleum Allocation Act of 1973 to provide worker assistance to any individual unemployed because of the administration and enforcement of such act, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Requires the President to minimize any adverse impact of the Emergency Petroleum Allocation Act upon employment.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Emergency Petroleum Allocation Act of 1973 to provide worker assistance to any individual unemployed because of the administration and enforcement of such act, and for other purposes.
